name: Undesign system v1
description:
The most efficient design system.


Version 1 features:

  • Resizable inputs
  • Color palettes + styles
  • Undesign icon library included


Note that this design system has used Figma features to their best ability to provide the easiest way to use a design system. Fully customizable buttons, text inputs and textareas has made this design system by far one of the best out there!


I strongly recommend to duplicate and play with the features.


Like if you loved it ;)
